title: Let's make: A Whip using ADC!
body: Comment below with your thoughts and I'll add them. We're aiming for a Whip-using adc here.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=JamenFar,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=aZhN5AME,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-14T00:14:36.171+0000)
>
> AD thresh

Why is there always someone like you in threads?

Nevermind that, As nice as a whip-user sounds, i think we need a knife-thrower ADC first.

Possibly on the theme of a dancer, so this character can put spins on Sona's songs.
Those are like chains (bone chains, but still chains) with scythes, not a whip.  Just throwing that out there.

Already made one a few months back :). While it isn't an ADC, it still got equal first score for his abilities section on the May CCOS :P. Here is Vakin- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/UUcZNhzE-champion-concept-vakin-the-livewire-whip

Yay for Lets Make threads! No consequences, just brainstorming! That being said, here are a few skill ideas that may or may not work in a kit together.
For the purposes of description, I will dub this champion ZeWhip.
>Flayed Skin
ZeWhip passively applies stacks of Flayed Skin to enemy champions he strikes with auto attacks.
Upon activation, all targets afflicted by Flayed Skin begin to bleed out for 3 seconds, taking physical damage based on their missing health and how many stacks of Flayed Skin they have.

Simple attack speed incentive and execute ability.
>Lacerate
ZeWhip strikes quickly in a cone in front of himself, dealing physical damage and applying on hit effects every X seconds for 3 seconds. X scales based on attack speed and spell rank. ZeWhip can cancel this abilty prematurely.

An idea I posted to another champ concept. Intended for stacking on hit effects.
>Cyclone Cord
ZeWhip damages all enemies around himself and knocks them a short distance in target direction.

Self peel and utility. Pretty simple.
>Crack of the Whip
ZeWhip's next basic attack unleashes a deafening crack, dealing additional physical damage based on missing health and briefly fearing all enemies around his target. If the target is killed by this ability, the duration is doubled.

Replace the fear with whatever you want. A skill designed to make ZeWhip far more frightening near the end of teamfights.

What with all the skills I've listed so far, there isn't much you can do with a whip wielder without any other thematic elements. Whatever, that's all I got for now. Happy brainstorming!
